General.Name: Wintao Communications Co. Ltd
General.Description: Wintao Communications Co.,Ltd provides communication technology services in China. It offers communication network maintenance and optimization; and communication network construction services for mobile, telecom, Unicom, and other communication operators, as well as communication infrastructure operators and communication equipment manufacturers. It also provides communication network engineering services; and software development and outsourcing services. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Urumqi, China.
